Class DoctorScheduleService

java.lang.Object
services.DoctorScheduleService
public class DoctorScheduleService extends Object
DoctorScheduleService handles business logic related to doctor schedules.

      public List<DoctorSchedule> getAvailableSlotsForDoctor(String doctorId)
      Retrieves the available slots for a specific doctor based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the unique identifier of the doctor
      Returns:
      a list of DoctorSchedule objects representing the available slots for the specified doctor

      Updates the doctor's schedule after an appointment is booked.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The doctor's ID.
      date - The date of the appointment.
      appointmentStartTime - The start time of the appointment.
      appointmentEndTime - The end time of the appointment.
